cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 50 mi WSW of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to meander in the southern Bay of Campeche through Thursday, then gradually lift northward toward the central Gulf of Mexico over the weekend, aiming generally toward the north-central Gulf Coast.

port.name: Port of Greater Baton Rouge, LA

weather_observation.watch_coast: None along U.S. coast; present only from Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, MX
weather_observation.warning_coast: Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, MX (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico; central Gulf waters later in the period
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at the port through the 5-day forecast period.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None forecast for the Louisiana coast through the 5-day period.
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall impacts expected at the port through the 5-day period.
